item.title: Terri add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "The best kind of friend is the kind you sit with, never say a word and walk away feeling like it was the best conversation you ever had." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Terri add a quote by Winn Claybaugh
item.description: "Add "nice" to whatever you're doing and watch opportunities open up all around you." -- Winn Claybaugh

item.title: Terri add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Terri add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "The way we see the problem is the problem." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Terri add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "I think the purpose of life is to be useful, to be responsible, to be honorable, to be compassionate. It is, after all, to matter: to count, to stand for something, to have made some difference that you lived at all." -- Leo Rosten
